entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
